column1: [Highlight] Garrett Temple does a Matrix dodge and sinks the three. (30.01.2021 POR@CHI)
Garrett Temple 21 pts 2 threes 3 asts vs Mavericks
How were more teams not going after Garrett Temple?
[Highlight] Marcus Smart denies Garrett Temple on the fast break
[FortyEightMinutes] The Chicago Bulls declined a trade offer from the Indiana Pacers for Garrett Temple, per The Indy Star "The Bulls have showed no interest in dealing him to their division rival."
If Garrett Temple wins 3 rings will he be better than Michael Jordan?
[Highlight] Garrett Temple with a behind-the-back dish to Thad Young in traffic, who lays it in.

[Charania] The Chicago Bulls are sending Tomas Satoransky, Garrett Temple and a second-round pick to New Orleans for Lonzo Ball, who's signing a four-year, $85M contract, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium.
[Aldridge] Per source, veteran guard Garrett Temple will be going to the New Orleans Hornets on a three-year deal, with first two years guaranteed at $5 million per.
[Wojnarowski] Free agent Garrett Temple has agreed to a deal with the Pelicans, per @PrioritySports .

Jeff Green became the 9th player in NBA history to play for at least 11 different teams ... a few minutes later Garrett Temple became the 10th. The league record is 12. There have been four players who played for 12 different teams.
